summary: I WAS DRIVING ON I70 FROM DENVER TO LEADVILLE.  ON A DOWNHILL SITUATION I HIT BRAKES AND THE STEERING STARTED SHAKING CAUSING ME TO PANIC.   I NEARLY LOST CONTROL AND DROVE OVER THE EDGE OF THE MOUNTAIN.    TOOK THE CAR TO HONDA AND THEY SAID THEY WERE ABLE TO RECREATE IT.  THEY TOLD ME THAT THE ROTORS WOULD GET TOO HOT AND WARP, CAUSING THE STEERING TO SHAKE.  THEY WANTED ME TO PAY THEM $400 TO FIX THE PROBLEM.  I DON'T HAVE THAT MONEY TO DO SO. *TR
